content.text:
# Tiwari ministry (Uttarakhand)

|border=darkgray}} Indian National Congress
| legislature_status      = Majority
| opposition_cabinet      =
| opposition_party        =  |border=darkgray}} Bharatiya Janata Party
| opposition_leader       =  Bhagat Singh KoshyariMatbar Singh Kandari
| election                = 2002
| last_election           = 2007
| legislature_term        = 5 years
| budget                  =
| advice_and_consent1     =
| advice_and_consent2     =
| incoming_formation      = 1st Assembly
| outgoing_formation      = 2nd Assembly
| previous                = Koshyari ministry
| successor               = First Khanduri ministry
}}
The Narayan Datt Tiwari ministry was the Cabinet of Uttarakhand headed by the Chief Minister of Uttarakhand, N. D. Tiwari from 2002 to 2007.
Council of Ministers
Here is the list of cabinet ministers.
